Detect Poison And Disease (P1 Divi): R30' Self senses poison for conc or 10 min
Dispel Magic (P3 [Oath Of Devotion] Abju): R120' Ends spell effects up to spell level 3 on target, higher levels require DC 10 + spell level check

Magic Weapon (P2 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 magic bonus for conc or 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (P1 Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead, and those creatures suffer Disadv on attack on touched

Revivify (P3 Necr): Restores touched 1-minute-old corpse to life w/1 HP
Sanctuary (P1 [Oath Of Devotion] Abju): R30' Foes of target attack another (Wis neg) for 1 min
Searing Smite (P1 Evoc): Self weapon inflicts +1d6 HP fire, target suffers 1d6 HP fire/rd (Con ends per-rd damage) for conc or 1 min
Zone Of Truth (P2 [Oath Of Devotion] Ench): R60' Creatures in 15' radius cannot lie (Cha neg) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Divine Sense: R60' Know location of celestials, fiends, and undead for 1 rd 4/long rest
Lay On Hands: Heal 50 HP/long rest, use 5 HP worth to cure disease or poison
Turn The Unholy: R30' Channel Divinity makes fiends and undead flee (DC 15 Wis neg) for 1 min
